en-US.summary: Chat with AI using your voice through Alexa
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask AI Chat what is artificial intelligence
Alexa, tell AI Chat to explain quantum computing
en-US.name: AI Chat
en-US.description: AI Chat lets you have natural conversations with advanced AI language models through your Alexa device. Ask questions, get explanations, brainstorm ideas, or just chat about anything that interests you. Free users get 5 conversations per day, while premium subscribers enjoy unlimited conversations with access to more powerful AI models.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
To test this skill:
1. Say 'Alexa, open AI Chat'
2. Ask any question like 'What is machine learning?'
3. Continue the conversation with follow-up questions
4. Say 'stop' to end the session

For subscription testing:
1. Ask about premium features
2. Follow the purchase flow
3. Test unlimited usage after purchase
